content.detailedDescription:
This sighting happened in mid september 1974. i was 22 at the time. i lived with my mother on wilmington island outside savannah, ga. my brother, a friend and i were driving into savannah in his small chevrolet truck to see a friend. it was dusk and just starting to get dark. my brother turned on his headlights and they came on but immediately started to dim. we were on a bridge over the intracoastal waterway leading into thunderbolt. when we 
were over the bridge he pulled off onto a road by the river leading to a marina and we stopped to try and find out what was wrong. three friends of ours in a van saw the truck 
from the bridge and came over to see what we were doing. one of them worked at a gas station and had a little mechanical training. i got out from under the hood as it was now getting crowded and leaned against the side of the truck looking out over the marsh. i saw bright lights in the sky and was trying to determine what it was when one of our friends from the van looked out over the marsh and said, "that's a f*cking flying saucer!". i was coming to 
the same conclusion but wanted to be sure before i told anyone else. it was a metallic disk fairly large or much closer than i though, i guessed it was 60-80 feet in diameter. it had a round bottom and top with a small dome in the middle of the top. there was a short mast on 
top of the dome. there were bright white lights rotating around the rim of the disk and a steady blue light on top of the mast. though it was getting dark when we first saw it it appeared to have a dull metallic finish. it looked just like a cartoon flying saucer. i thought it was about 1/2 a mile away and about 1500-2000 feet in the air. it was north of us moving slowly west. there was no sound from it. we watched it for a couple of minutes until we lost 
sight of it behind trees on the bluff at the edge of the marsh. the friend with mechanical training had traced the problem to a known bad voltage regulator and managed to unstick it so we could use the headlights. we closed the hood and were standing near the truck talking when the ufo came back into view from behind the trees. it was lower now and closer. we watched it and soon realized it was headed straight for us and still getting lower. when it was 
probably 200-300 yards away and now down to about 500 feet i started worrying that maybe we were in danger. i didn't know it at the time the but several of the others were also starting to get worried. the ufo stopped moving and hovered for about 10-15 seconds (at least it seemed) then it slowly started moving towards the northeast and began gaining altitude. after it reached approximately the altitude we had first seen it at it picked up a little more speed 
and continued on a northeast course more or less following the path of the wilmington river. even at the fastest we saw it move it was probably going only 25-50 mph. a few minutes after it left a car with six excited teenagers in it pulled up along side. they said they had been following a flying saucer they saw at isle of hope and wanted to know if we had seen it. we were getting in our respective vehicles and had been there for 20-30 minutes so we told them we hadn't seen it. you could actually still see it's lights to the northeast if you knew where to look. there was no mention of anyone else seeing it in the newspaper or on the television news. it had to have been visible  to other people crossing the bridge over the river. we didn't report it either. this sighting happened about four miles from hunter army airfield which was not active at the time. i don't know whether they even used the radar during the time it was in caretaker status. the illustration is crude but the shape and the lights are as accurate as i could make them. the drawing was done in about 1993 using ms paint. i took a picture of the monitor since all i had was a dot matrix printer. i lost the file to a hard 
drive failure so this is a scan of the monitor photo done a couple of years later.
content.summary: Metallic disk at dusk

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in my car on the way home as i came down hickory ridge road and i saw a bright light above the trees i thought it was a airplane or something like that but when i got closer to the thing my car's power started fluctuating and my car shut off as the light went over my car the thing looked like a bright oval shaped vehicule and it moved very slow at times and very very fast at other times and would stay in one area, well my first reaction was i thought i was seeing something but when my car turned off i realized that something wasnt right and i knew i had saw something incredible well after 15 minutes the thing just disappered and i was able to start my car and so was the lady that was behind me when are cars died.
content.summary: Bright light above road at tree level

content.detailedDescription: I honestly cannot recall the date but i know for sure it was in the summer/fall of 2004 that we saw the first one, because i was taking a class at the travis airforce base and they wouldn't let anyone off the base for about an hour. finally they let us go and my husband called me on my cell to tell me there is a ufo in the sky. he had one of those lights that have a billion watts and pointed at it and it came toward them and freaked them out. i came home and watched from my house and saw it zigzag back and forth then stopping in midair hovering and then there was a flash of light and 4-6 objects shot out of it downward and then the object left. it happened again in january i believe. me and my son joked around and would looked if we saw our friends in the sky...And they came again...And again... we've noticed they been coming every two months. there was an incident were there were crop circles before all this happened. my son woke me up last month about 4 or so in the morning to show me the object in the sky...He was flashing the light at it and it would follow it if he moved it to the left and then when he moved it to the right and it followed. it scared me so i made him stop. but i want you to know that i will try to be more thorough and try to get a video of it. i saw a broadcast on the tv... so i decided to tell you guys what is going on here in fairfield late at night.
content.summary: An object hovering in the sky zigzaging up and down, side to side, then a spark of light and 4-6 round objects released shooting downward, then a spark again and the craft quickly disappears leaving a ray of light.

An object hovering in the sky zigzaging up and down, side to side, then a spark of light and 4-6 round objects released shooting downward, then a spark again and the craft quickly disappears leaving a ray of light.

content.detailedDescription:
About a week ago i saw 2 wedge-shaped craft that looked alot like the attached except the front light was a very large blinding white light and the other lights were not colored or flashing.

i was on the beach in malibu at night around 8pm with my dog...Like the article below they were moving slow and rather low, cruising as if patroling the beach and nearby mountain area.  

i do not rememeber hearing any engine but at the time they were so obvious i took them for military vehicles (us)..It is only later when i talked to pilots and found out there is no known craft fitting the 'wedge-shaped' description, did it occur to me that they might not be ours.

the size was larger than an average plane but not outrageously large like some triangles are being described.  they might be considered about the size of 2 planes..But the body is 'fat' and they look very sort of chunky unlike the ufo's i've seen that move at incredibly rapid speeds.

the first one came toward the beach perpendicular to it flying inland from out in the ocean --when i first saw it, it appeared to be a star from far away but then it got larger (a blinding white light) and seemed to be stationary over the ocean..I began to think it was a helicopter..But it finally came close and flew overhead and i could see it was this clunky wedge-shaped body, it sort of curved and fly overhead then another one came out of the north and from behind me and also flew in a leisurely way overhead...Since there were two and i was still thinking they had to be ours because they looked so ..Workhorse like and really seemed to be patroling..I didn't pay much more attention..I didn't lose sight of them they continued cruising around for a while.  i was on the beach walking my dog for about 45 mins..I am attaching a photo i found online that approximates the way they looked..
content.summary: 2 wedge-shaped craft patroling beach and surrounding mountains

content.detailedDescription:
Travelling along the higway out of ottawa, my attention was drawn to a white shiny object hovering over a farmers field about 2km from our location. the object appeared to hover about 2-300 ft above the field. it was very shiny and after approximately 3 minutes it flew off in the opposit direction and in a mere second had vanished from sight.

at first i thought it was an airplane but dismissed that because it was stationary for the time i saw it until it took off. the last thing on my mind was that i was seeing a ufo, but after consideration its the only thing it could have been.
content.summary: Shiny oval object hovering over farmers field

content.detailedDescription: This is my third siting! i called local sheriff dept. they sent two cars. corporal wilson used my binoculars to look at ufo. his words " what the hell is that? i've never seen anything like that." this siting macthes my first report made a few weeks ago. this is the same object going slowly through same part of sky. it has blue, green, red, yellow, and white flashing lights. i gave report with deputy sheriff while ufo was visable.I do have some low grade video from the first sighting. can you send me a field investgator ?
content.summary: Third siting ! multi-colored lights long and thin shape, disc or cylander shape viewed from side
Bright light, did not blink, silent
Saw same ufos two days in a row

content.detailedDescription:
This happened to my girlfriend and sister, one month ago. and now it happened to my girlfriend again tonight, 2 minutes before i arrived at her house.

a triangle with red lights on the corners, flying low, and moving back and forth and in weird motions, doing what would seem like impossible manuevers. then it flew away over the houses and trees.
content.summary: Triangle, with red lights

content.detailedDescription:
This happened to my girlfriend and sister, one month ago. and now it happened to my girlfriend again tonight, 2 minutes before i arrived at her house.

a triangle with red lights on the corners, flying low, and moving back and forth and in weird motions, doing what would seem like impossible manuevers. then it flew away over the houses and trees.
content.summary: Triangle, with red lights

content.detailedDescription:
My wife & i were playing with the kids outside when my wife and youngest son called my attention to the object.
my wife asked me what it was. my first impression was a hot air balloon because of the shape, but it was brightly reflecting the sunlight (sun had just set)and there was no apparant color other than metallic/silver.

i can only guess at it's altitude of about 10,000 feet. i told my wife to keep an eye on it, and grabbed my binoculars and video camera. had no problem finding it in the binoculars, but had an extremly difficult time locating it with the camera. finally got it, and kept it for maybe 45 seconds, but lost it due to altitude.

in the beginning, it seemed stationary, then as air traffic picked up (could have been due to the airport being so close by, but traffic seemed unusually high) but as traffic increased, it slowly began moving southwest while gaining altitude. after about 10 minutes, it began moving northeast while still gaining altitude. the entire time, it moved very slowly. we watched until it was out of sight due to the altitude of the object.

i will try and add picture or video later, as i just came in about 10 minutes ago.
content.summary: Low flying orb

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from slc.  i took my normal route.  i turned east on 200 west in provo just before you cross the train tracks.  i could see the university overpass and the mountains against the night sky.  a large cluster of lights moving very fast past in front of my view.  they were lower than the mountain tops which are about 10,000 feet.  they flew in a south south west direction until out of sight.  what was interesting was that looking at them head on they were quite bright but their light dimmed once they past over.  it is hard to say how many there where.  i estimate between 20 to a 100.
content.summary: Large cluster over provo

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard about 4 nights ago some strange things have been seen in the sky around here by me and that might have made me more aware than others to take a second look at these lights. with my naked eye they just look like stars but way too low in the sky for stars. one is bigger and brighter than the other. they have come every night for the last 4 or 5 nights. they show up before sunset and are gone about an hour and a half later. i got some excellent video footage of these lights. when i zoom in the larger light (actually both lights, but i focused more on the one i could see better) it changes from brilliant white to purple to emrald green and sometimes seems to change shape. i can see right into the thing as it changes colors but it has a distinct border...It's not like a blob light it's very purposefull in shape. these lights hover and are pretty still.

i am in the elverta, california area. if anyone from here reads this these lights are appearing it seems somewhat over elverta road just down from the cherry brook fire dept. i see them from my backyard and i live on colonnade way. if anyone from this area reads this please keep your eyes to the sky... also at around 10 pm every night for a week there is another light that comes pretty much directly over the fire station and it is gone by 11:30 pm my video does not take night time shots very well so i have not been able to capture this one on film. it is a single light too low to be a star but high enough that people would preobably think it was one.

also enclosed in this report are two pictures i snapped of a seperate incident about a week ago ..Maybe a week and a half of a silver round light object right over my duck pond. this object was moving and caught my eye as i walked out back one morning around 8 am approx. i ran for my camera and got off 2 snaps of it before it traveled away. it appeared to be rotating. please look at my photos. 

thank you
content.summary: Balls of light in the sky/ they look like energy/plasma, turning white, purple, emerald green

content.detailedDescription: Date: approx. 11:55 pm sat, sept. 3, 2005.  i had just finished watching auburn lose its season opener to georgia tech.  i went outside where my wife had just pulled in the driveway from visiting a friend.  i lit a cigarette and was sitting on the porch with her discussing her friend's impending divorce. the time was about 11:55 pm.  i glanced into the cloudless night sky and saw what appeared to be a shooting star without its tracer racing from the south heading in a northern direction.  i grabbed my wife's arm and pointed towards the object (she has never seen a meteorite and i was excited).  it was high...Looked to be skipping across the atmosphere at an extremely high rate of speed.  it was orb-shaped, almost as if staring at a distant street light with a faint halo.  the whole object had what i can only refer to as a faint, dark illumination surrounded by this halo.  on either side, it had a brighter illumination similar to a faint satellite catching the suns rays two hours after sunset. it was almost triangular, but that could be my imagination.  before i could say the words shooting star, it slowed tremendously and veered east in a pendulum motion, then north, then continued back to where it had first slowed in a southern direction.  during this southern veer, three more similar objects appeared... one from the south, one from the southeast, and one from the southwest.  one moment, they were not there, and the second moment they were.  i did not see them race across the sky like the first object.  they just suddenly appeared and slowed.  all four converged on each other as if showing some kind of interest, forming a circle.  then, they rotated counter-clockwise and diappeared instantly towards the north.  all four vanished just as quickly as the three objects had appeared, almost like a meteorite burning out.  i can honestly say that i have always been fascinated with the "what if" possibility of this sort of phenomenom, but have always said that i would not believe unless one landed in my yard and offered me a drink.  my wife witnessed this same event, and even though her excitement was truly non-existent, i cannot say the same for mine.  it has changed my beliefs.  i immediately called my brother in north carolina and woke him up to tell him.  i feel like i need to tell everyone i know, but at the same time, i don't want to become the weird person in the neighborhood.  what i saw was amazing.  all my life, i've looked at stars, planets, satellites, comets, and meteorites, and i can say i have never in my life seen something like this.  it lasted approximately ten seconds, but honestly, it was probably even shorter than that.  about ten minutes after the occurence, a jet high above plodded across the sky.  the speed of these objects were 100's of times faster.  it was as if they went from 5000 mph to 500 mph instantaneously.  i am still somewhat in shock.  i watch all of these "crazy people" report their abductions and their visitations on these shows that aire about ufos.  like most of the population, i laugh at some of the stories we read and witness on tv.  i don't know if i can laugh anymore.  i don't know what to believe.  i'm still amazed almost 18 hrs after the event.  is that a common type of sighting?  they weren't in my backyard... they were high above like a meteorite.  wow

I was working outside when a band of storms was coming in from the west, one the day or a day after katrina went into new orleans. the sun was behind the clouds but atop the clouds i saw tw or three lights spaced far apart. i couldnot see the source of the lights but i saw the beams, like when you shine a flashlight through fog. the lights themselves would swing around and change in size, like they were searchlights, and being refocused.From the way they swung around i thought the source was above/behind the clouds. i saw them until the rain clouds came over then they were hidden.
content.summary: Two or more lights atop clouds

content.detailedDescription: Myself & my girlfriend (now my wife) were coming home from my cousin's house after midnight on a 2 lane blacktop that heads south off of sr 159 just east of blackhawk. we got maybe 1 1/2 miles down the road when i noticed a bright light on the left side of the road up in the sky,i asked my girlfriend to look at the light and i asked her "why would a plane have it's landing lights on out here?" i knew there is no airports around this area to land a plane! we dropped down into a low spot in the road and lost sight of it for a moment,when we came back up,it began slowly moving over the roadway ahead of where we were driving. as we approached,it moved from our left side to our right side and i said "what the hell is that!!!" as we got closer. the whole time the object stayed about tree top level,maybe 50 to 75 feet off the ground and moved across a farmfield on our right side.As we drove up beside the field i stopped the truck and said again "what is that??" my girlfriend said "i don't know" as she staired out the window,i wanted a clearer view so i rolled down my window and sat on the window opening looking across the truck roof as the object had stopped moving over a grove of trees about 100 to 150 feet away from the road. i reached inside the truck and shut off the running engine of the truck,my girlfriend asked me "what are you doing?" being freaked out alot by what she was seeing. "sshhh!" i said. "what are you doing!!!" she asked again. "ssshhhhh!!! shut up and listen!!" i said. the object was making no sound,but a wind or hissing sound. we couldn't see a outline very well but by the pattern of it's lights it must have been disk or triangular shaped. it had a light on the very top and different colored lights around it's edge,underneathe it was what looked like "windows" and at the bottom center was a single red light flashing slowly. both me and my girlfriend (weird thing was) at the same time felt like we became afraid and needed to leave the area right away,so we started the truck and left the area. we never told anyone and later found out other people in that area had called the local tv station reporting a ufo in the area (wtwo station in farmersburg,in.)this is the first time i have reported this to anyone,all these people are seeing something!!! i have been afraid to tell anyone because the public thinks you are some kind of a "nut", i'm sorry i withheld this so long.
content.summary: Silent ufo hover above trees w/solid & some flashing colored lights

content.detailedDescription: Out in the back garden, said to husband look - it looked like a planed moving accross the sky towards the east, silent - no sound - no flashing lights etc - just constantly shone.  appeared at one point to be heading in commercial plane flight path but could not tell correct trojectory etc .
content.summary: Bright light zoomed towards east seemed to cross commercial flight path definitley not a commercial/chartared plane - no noise etc!!!

content.detailedDescription:
My grandson and i were having lunch on the porch of the richards libary during their apple pie festival.  he was seated facing me, and i was seated facing the street and the common.  i was looking for clouds since it was hot and was wondering rain would be comming.  

i noticed a round flying object in the sky.  at first i thought it was a hoover disk, but it appeared to be too far up in the sky.  it went out of my sight, behind a tree (the common is lined with trees) and i waited for it to come out the other side, but it disapeared.

it was dark, dark, gray, almost black and i did not hear any sound.   i kept looking up for it to reapear and looked for anyone on the common that may have seen the object, but everyone was going about their business as usual.   

i felt like i had seen something special and couldn't share it with anyone.   

prior to reporting this tonight, i looked to see if there were any other sigthings that day.  i did not find any, but did find some sightings about an hour away from our home, but the objects were completely different.
content.summary: A round ufo flying about the same height of a small plane, it slipped behind a tree and never re appeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My mom was outside on the back deck of our house letting the dog out when my little sister and i joined her. i looked at the sky because i hadn't looked at the stars in a long time when my mom asked me what this thing was in the sky. at first, i thought it was an airplane and said so, but then my mom said that she'd never seen a plane move that fast before, and i realized i hadn't either. i then said a satellite, but the object, we noticed, was zigzagging, which they don't do. i then thought space garbage but that was absurd.

the object was, during this exchange between my mom, sister, and me, moving across the sky quite fast and zigzagging once and awhile. it was only the size of a pinprick in the sky, no larger than any of the stars visible in the sky. we were all just speculating as to what the object was, saying "what is that?" and "look at that." i think we were all in awe. 

this whole episode only lasted less than a minute and abruptly ended when i lost sight of the object when it approached a cloud and then, disappeared in a large (compared to the size of the object, it was large) flash of light. we stayed outside for a minute or two trying to find the object again but to no avail. that was it. very short in duration and really no detail, but it's driving me nuts not knowing what it was.
content.summary: A small pinpoint of light that zigzagged across the sky then disappeared with a flash of light.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work on september 2, 2005. i was about 5:30pm perhaps 5:45. i was driving south on the 169. i had just passed where the freeway had split off to the 18 and the 13. i still was on the 169. i noticed up in the sky a round silver object. at first i thought it was a plane. i looked up at it a several times thinking that it was kind of strange looking plane. suddenly a bright light came from the object. so bright i was blinded for a second. i was looking at it at the time. i thought that it was a reflection from the sun, but with the entire airplanes i have seen in my life i have not ever seen it reflect light like that. because i was driving, i had to keep glancing at the road as i was trying to follow the strange looking plane. after the bright light, the object was there for about a minute or less then it disappeared. it left no vapor trail. and i kept glancing up to see if i could spot it again, but i no longer could see it.
content.summary: Round silver object

content.detailedDescription:
Description here by lead investigator.  female witness (24) arrives home from work about 02:30 hours. at 03:14 hours sees disk object in the northwest sky, 60 degree inclination. hovers side to side.  when witness goes outside for better look, object disappears. when witness returns to her bedroom, object re-appears into view again through her window.  object displays hovering & some subtle non-ballastic motion.  witness calls her mother (44), both see object clearly.  both witnesses agree.  mother returns to her bedroom, as her grandson is upset.  grandson clings tightly to grandmother in their bed.  

daughter (24) becomes drowzy gazing at object through her bedroom window from her bed.  possible missing time - witness thinks 10 minutes or 90 minutes (1 1/2 hours).  

a being or entity appears at daughters bedside, almost can touch.  being seen from knees up.  being appeared female (hybrid?), oval gray/brown complexion. oval shaped face, with pointed pronounced chin.  large brown eyes.  black straight hair on head down to waist. witness described being as 'beautiful'.  being first seen in right profile, then slowly turns to face witness directly.  witnes felt being turned slowly as not be appear 'threatening'.  witness does not remember other details after this.

witness contacted mufon investigator only 8 hours after occurrance!  three investigators (northern california state director, state section director - alameda co., and local stockton mufon field investigator trainee) one week later.  did not wish to contact witesses alone.  promised to be complex case, and for my personal safety (initial meeting w/strangers).

object described by witnesses matched exactly gold disk in dublin, california auto dealership case (occurred novemeber 5, 2004 at 18:45 hours - see mufon case report jsr-0011) report just previously completed.  witnesses displayed great emotion when they were shown at end of interviews the police forensic sketch of the 'dublin object'.
content.summary: Hovering disk, distance of object varies, two witnesses, missing time, entity (female hybrid?) appears in bedroom.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in the grass looking at a clear blue sky near lafayette reservoir and i say two silver round disc shaped objects flying side by side about as high as you see the higher flying planes fly, could be about 5 or 6 mileshigh.  they seemed to just disappear after about 10 seconds. there was no sound that i could here. no doubt these were ufo's. i was amazed that i saw these objects.
content.summary: I saw 2 flying dics for about 10 sec.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking from the port town on paros after taking the last ferry from pireas athens. i believe i had a 23 kilometer walk to make it to cristi atki where i was camping. it was very desolate and extremely dark as i walked. i was familiar with the route and knew that i would have to go through a dangerous pass around the right side of a small peak. i had been in a prayerful contemplative mood when i looked up towards the area where the peak was and noticed the four lights. initially i supposed they were two cars headlights folowing one another, but i remembered there was no road at that height, in fact it wrapped the base and i was on it. i believe just before the lights appeared a cool circular wind began to buffet me in circular and upward movements then all of a sudden the 4 lights shot forward and struck me in the chest. the next thing i remember i was taking a step as a great explosion of light seemed to leave my head. i was absolutely freightened following. the lights were gone but i became rather paranoid immediately following and was rather afraid to continue on but i knew i had to as there are the occasional pack of wild dogs on the island. later a strange old man stopped and picked me up, my greek was poor and we couldnt speak but somehow he knew where i was going and drove me the rest of the way. i offered to buy him a coffee, he declined, turned around and went back the way we had come. later that night i looked up and saw a group of stars that looked a little like a kite. for some reason i took to them and started identifying with them in some way i guess. i used to call them the stars of sam the name of my girlfriend at the time. later i thought i identified the system as the 7 sisters. i still look for those stars in august. any understanding of these events would be greatly appreciated.
content.summary: 4 balls of white light flying in a diagonal line

content.detailedDescription: My brother was camping out high up in the mountains. they noticed the lights in the sjy come out of no where. the light seemed as though they were flasing at them so they flashed back. he got a very good look but poor pictures,  they move so fast. they actuly got very nervous maybe scared. he really does not want ot talk to anyone about it but her are some pics he sent me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Bright fast lights. they made a triangle, then a stright line then a circle after we falsed light at them

content.detailedDescription: Flying east at fl370 about 200nm west of anc and 50-100 south of sparrevohn.  observed what first appeared to be aircraft 2-10nm north of us and flying parallel in same direction appx. 2,000/4,000ft below our altitude.  observed several lights on craft (nav lights?) and one white strobe on aft side of craft. asked atc about traffic and they reported "no traffic" in our area except a king air 100nm north and at fl260 which was too far away to be this craft which was keep ing pace with us (500kts ground speed which king air is un-capable of).  we slowly moved ahead of craft and eventually (2-4min) lost sight at our 7 o'clock position when be began descent into anc.

Photo taken at mookini heiau, the site was completely deserted  except for a very abrasive care taker and my family. i had just walked to the entrance, i was standing just to the right of the mookini heiau sign. photos previous and post, within a few seconds show nothing out of the ordinary. i thought it may be dirt but why would the previous and post photos have no sign of lense dirt. camera was brand spankin new outta the box. i never saw the object. it looks spherical and is lighter on top than on the bottom. the walls to the right are about 10 feet tall if not taller.
content.summary: Didnt see anything visible, noticed the object a few hours later while going over my days photos

content.altitude: Landed, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: Every night that i take my dog out for a walk. seeing the beutlful lights, blue,red green&white. blinking. spining, staying  in the same place for hours. then they go away but they always are back the next night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Boomerang,  Cylinder,  Diamond,  Disc,  Oval,  Saturn-like,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Triangle
content.summary: Blue&red ,green, white. bright lights in the sky some every night .

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a local pond unwinding. this location is an access point for small boats like canoes and puddle jumpers. it is a quiet spot in the burbs but not an isolated one. i frequent this spot and do a little fishing etc. allot of people go there. it closes at dark although there are no gates. on this particular night i was star gazing at sunset as it was a good observation point to watch an unusual planetary alignment that had been going on for at least a week. i'm not an expert on star gazing but the planets seemed to be in the western sky near a crescent moon. as the moon cycle changed it moved away from the planets.  anyway i gazed for what i thought was about 15 min and decided to call it a night and started back to my truck. as i approached my truck i could see police on the other side of the pond in the local cemetary shining thier spotlights into the area i was parked. i thought, jeez i better get out of here or the'll be down here busting my chops for being here after hours. i drove home. when i got home it was 10:30 pm  an utter impossibilty  i only live ten minutes from the boat launch. i estimated my time being there as 1 hour tops. i got ther about 15 min before sunset and as stated only gazed for 15 minutes maybe 30 minutes tops. when i started thinking about the whole ordeal i got very confused. were the police on the other side of the pond investigating something? i have never seen them in this location with spotlights and i have no clue why they would be looking from that location to my location as they could have just driven over to where i was in about 5 minutes. it does not make sense? i also noticed that i had a sore on my lower back that itched and had like a kinda a welt near it. it wasn't painfull or anything just itchy. it was gone the next day. well this is my story, it is completely true. i estimate i cannot account for approximatley one hour of time perhaps a little more. i dont have any recollection of anything like an abduction happening or anything like that .
but i can assure you something happened down there. what it was i cannot say but i am still puzzled some days later.
content.summary: This is an authentic missing time event
